skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns. 

After attacking, places a 25% [Poison Sensitivity] debuff on enemies under 2 or more [Poison] debuffs.
